questions.description: Names, ages, addresses, other personal information.
questions.question: What is the name and details of the victims?
What was the crime and how was it committed?

questions.description: Confirm with official sources.
questions.question: What is the date, time and location of the crime?

questions.description: (According to paramedics, police or other official sources.)
questions.question: In the case of death, what was the official cause?
What injuries did the victims suffer and what weapon was used?
What was the motivation for the crime and what is the background of victim? (if relevant?)
Have there been any arrests and are there any suspects or clues?
Are there any strange circumstances surrounding the crime?
Get comment from the victim, witnesses, police and other official sources.

questions.description: Name, ouderdomme, adresse, ander persoonlike inligting.
questions.question: Wat is die name en besonderhede van die slagoffers?
Wat was die misdaad en hoe is dit gepleeg?

questions.description: Bevestig met amptelike bronne.
questions.question: Op wattter datum, tyd en plek het die misdaad plaasgevind?

questions.description: (Volgens paramedici, polisie of ander amptelike bronne.)
questions.question: In die geval van 'n sterfte, wat was die amptelike oorsaak?
Wat was die aard van die beserings en watter soort wapen is gebruik?
Wat het aanleiding gegee tot die misdaad en wat is die agtergrond van die slagoffer? (indien van toepassing?)
Was daar enige arrestasies en is daar enige verdagtes of leidrade?
Is daar enige vreemde omstandighede wat die misdaad betref?
Kry kommentaar van die slagoffer, getuies, polisie en ander amptelike bronne.

questions.description: Nombres, edades, direcciones, otra información personal.
questions.question: ¿Cuál es el nombre y los detalles de las víctimas?
¿Cuál fue el crimen y cómo se cometió?

questions.description: Confirme con fuentes oficiales.
questions.question: ¿Cuál es la fecha, hora y lugar del crimen?

questions.description: (Según paramédicos, policías u otras fuentes oficiales.)
questions.question: En el caso de la muerte, ¿cuál fue la causa oficial?
¿Qué lesiones sufrieron las víctimas y qué arma se utilizó?
¿Cuál fue la motivación del crimen y cuál es el origen de la víctima? (¿si es relevante?)
¿Ha habido alguna detención, hay sospechosos o pistas?
¿Hay alguna circunstancia extraña que rodee el crimen?
Obtenga comentarios de la víctima, testigos, policías y otras fuentes oficiales.

questions.description: Amagama, iminyaka yobudala, iidilesi nezinye iinkcukacha.
questions.question: Ngobani na amagama neenkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano zeengxwelerha?
Ibiyi ntoni ulwaphulo-mthetho kwaye ludalwe njani na?

questions.description: Qondisisa kuma gosa asemthethweni.
questions.question: Uthini umhla, ixesha kwakunye nendawo yolwaphulo-mthetho?

questions.description: (Ngokwa magosa ezonyango olukhawulezileyo, amapolisa okanye naliphi na igosa/icandelo elisemthethweni.)
questions.question: Kumba wokufa, yintoni imbangi esemthethweni?
Iingxwelerha zifumene monzakalo mni kwaye yintoni isikhali esisetyenzisiweyo?
Yintoni na ekhuthaze esisenzo solwaphulo-mthetho kwaye ithini intsukaphi yengxwelerha? (Ukuba ikhona indawo yayo)
Bakhona abantu abathe babanjwa ngamapolisa kwaye bakhona abarhanelwa okanye imikhondo kusini na?
Ingaba zikhona izehlo ezingaqondakaliyo nezingqonge indawo yolwaphulo-mthetho?
Fumana izimvo zeengxwelerha, amangqina, amapolisa kwakunye nezinye iingxelo ezisemthethweni.

questions.description: Maina, mengwaga, diaterese le tshedimošo e nngwe ka bona?
questions.question: Naa go tsebilwe batšwasehlabelo?
What was the crime and how was it committed?

questions.description: Confirm with official sources.
questions.question: What is the date, time and location of the crime?

questions.description: (According to paramedics, police or other official sources.)
questions.question: In the case of death, what was the official cause?

questions.description: Nomes, idades, endereços, outra informação pessoal.
questions.question: Qual é o nome e identidade das vítimas?
Qual foi o crime e como foi cometido?

questions.description: Confirme com as fontes oficiais.
questions.question: Qual é a data, hora e local do crime?

questions.description: (De acordo com o pessoal da saúde, polícia, outras fontes oficiais.)
questions.question: Em caso de morte, qual foi a causa oficial?
Que danos foram causados às vítimas e que arma foi usada?
Qual foi o motivo do crime e qual é o historial da vítima? (se for relevante.)
Tem havido alguma detenção e há alguns suspeitos ou pistas?
Existem algumas circunstâncias estranhas em volta do crime?
Obtenha declarações das vítimas, testemunhas, polícia e outras fontes oficiais.

questions.description: amagama, iminyaka, amakheli, kanye neminye imininingwane mayelana nabo
questions.question: obani amagama kanye nemininingwane ezisulu?
Ibuphi ubugebengu obenzekile nokuthi kwenzeke kanjani?

questions.description: Thola isiqiniseko esisemthethweni.
questions.question: Ingabe yenzeke kuphi, nini ngasikhathisini?
Ngokombiko wabezimo eziphuthumayo, amaphoyisa kanye neziphathimandla ingabe yini imbangela yokufa ?
Ingabe abathintekayo balimele kanjani nokuthi hlobo luni lwesikhali olusetshenzisiwe?
Ingabe yini imbangela yobugebengu kanye nemvelaphi yezisulu? (Uma kubalulekile)
Ingabe bakhona ababoshiwe noma abasolwayo okanye olunye ulwazi?
Ingabe sikhona isimo esingaqondakali mayelana nobugebengu?
Thola uvo lwezisulu, ofakazi, amaphoyisa, kanye nakuziphathimandla ezinolwazi.
